pr_title: Header/body does not exist anymore. Deprecate and remove own internal…

timeline.message: Header/body does not exist anymore. Deprecate and remove own internal usage.
As java and c++ now doe sth same thing size is the same.

timeline.bodyText: Do we have any files checked in testing that we can read from legacy multi-chunk serializations, or is this sufficiently ancient by now that we don't consider it necessary anymore?
timeline.author: vekterli

replies.bodyText:
It is fairly ancient, but I still think we have some.
I will check.
replies.author: baldersheim
